offer_summary.job_description: This position involves online teaching of groups ranging from 4 to 15 students. Workload includes leading interactive and engaging lessons based on provided scenarios and materials, monitoring student progress, and providing support as needed.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Python (algorithms, methods, conditional instructions, collections, data structures, OOP)
Good proficiency in English and ability to independently find information: you will often need to read materials in English to quickly solve problems.
Experience with Python libraries (EasyGUI, Pillow, Discord.py, aiogram etc.).
Experience creating chatbots for Telegram and Discord, as well as developing internet applications.
Ability to read and understand other people's code, especially in a work context and to help students effectively.
Fluency not only in programming but also in reading and understanding the code.
Punctuality, good organization and time management skills.
benefits: Discounts on firm products and services
